mapper.select: SELECT h.HSPTLZ_NO , c.treat_no as treat_no , r.rcept_no as rcept_no , p.pat_name as pat_name , p.pat_code as pat_code , p.PAT_HSPTLZ_STATUS , TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYY') - SUBSTR(p.pat_brthdy,0,4) as pat_age , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(p.pat_brthdy),'YYYY-MM-DD') as pat_brthdy , c1.com_code_name as pat_hsptlz_status , p.pat_hsptlz_in_date as pat_hsptlz_in_date , p.pat_hsptlz_out_plan aspat_hsptlz_out_plan , c2.com_code_name as pat_gen , c3.com_code_name as pat_path , c4.com_code_name as pat_first , c5.com_code_name as pat_day , e.emp_nm as emp_nm , hf.hos_fc_name as hos_fc_name , r.recept_time ,d.detail_no FROM tb_clinic c INNER JOIN tb_receipt r INNER JOIN tb_patient p INNER JOIN tb_common_code c2 ON p.pat_gen_code = c2.com_code AND c2.com_code_grp = 'GEND' ON r.pat_code = p.pat_code INNER JOIN tb_common_code c3 ON r.rcept_path_code = c3.com_code AND c3.com_code_grp = 'PVST' INNER JOIN tb_common_code c4 ON r.rcept_first_exam_code = c4.com_code AND c4.com_code_grp = 'FEXM' INNER JOIN tb_common_code c5 ON r.rcept_day_code = c5.com_code AND c5.com_code_grp = 'DAYN' ON c.rcept_no = r.rcept_no INNER JOIN tb_clinic_schedule cs INNER JOIN tb_hospital_facility hf ON hf.HOS_FC_NO = cs.HOS_FC_NO INNER JOIN tb_employee e ON e.emp_no = cs.emp_no ON r.schd_no = cs.schd_no INNER JOIN tb_common_code c1 ON p. pat_hsptlz_status= c1.com_code AND c1.com_code_grp = 'HSPT' INNER JOIN tb_chart_detail d ON d.TREAT_NO = c.TREAT_NO INNER JOIN TB_HOSPITALIZATION h ON h.PAT_CODE= p.PAT_CODE AND h.TREAT_NO = d.TREAT_NO WHERE p.PAT_HSPTLZ_STATUS = '3' AND h.HSPTLZ_YS = 'N'

SELECT A.SCKRM_TYPE_CODE, A.SCKRM_TYPE_OCC, B.SCKRM_NO, MAX(C.SCK_BD_CONDITION) AS SCK_BD_CONDITION FROM TB_SICK_ROOM_TYPE A INNER JOIN TB_SICK_ROOM B ON A.SCKRM_TYPE_CODE = B.SCKRM_TYPE_CODE INNER JOIN TB_SICKBED C ON B.SCKRM_NO = C.SCKRM_NO GROUP BY A.SCKRM_TYPE_CODE, A.SCKRM_TYPE_OCC, B.SCKRM_NO ORDER BY B.SCKRM_NO ASC

SELECT distinct(P.PAT_CODE) , P.PAT_NAME , h.hsptlz_no , H.SCKRM_NO , H.SCK_BD_NO , P.PAT_HSPTLZ_IN_DATE , P.PAT_HSPTLZ_OUT_PLAN , H.HSPTLZ_IN_DATE , H.HSPTLZ_OUT_DATE , E.EMP_NM , P.PAT_HSPTLZ_STATUS FROM TB_PATIENT P INNER JOIN TB_HOSPITALIZATION H ON P.PAT_CODE = H.PAT_CODE INNER JOIN TB_RECEIPT R ON R.PAT_CODE = P.PAT_CODE INNER JOIN TB_CLINIC_SCHEDULE S ON S.SCHD_NO = R.SCHD_NO INNER JOIN TB_EMPLOYEE E ON E.EMP_NO = S.EMP_NO INNER JOIN TB_SICKBED SI ON SI.SCK_BD_NO = H.SCK_BD_NO INNER JOIN TB_COMMON_CODE C1 ON C1.COM_CODE = SI.SCK_BD_CONDITION WHERE (PAT_HSPTLZ_STATUS = '4' OR PAT_HSPTLZ_STATUS ='5') AND H.hsptlz_ys='N' ORDER BY H.HSPTLZ_OUT_DATE ASC

SELECT h.hsptlz_no , h.pat_code , h.treat_no , h.hsptlz_payment , h.hsptlz_in_date , h.hsptlz_out_date , h.sck_bd_no , h.sckrm_no , p.pat_name , p.pat_hsptlz_status , p.pat_hsptlz_in_date , p.pat_hsptlz_out_plan , p.pat_ihidnum , p.pat_addr , p.pat_dtl_addr , p.pat_tel , e.emp_nm FROM tb_hospitalization h INNER JOIN tb_patient p ON h.pat_code = p.pat_code INNER JOIN tb_clinic c ON c.treat_no = h.treat_no INNER JOIN tb_receipt r ON r.rcept_no = c.rcept_no INNER JOIN tb_clinic_schedule cs ON cs.schd_no = r.schd_no INNER JOIN tb_employee e ON e.emp_no = cs.emp_no WHERE h.hsptlz_ys = 'N' AND ( p.pat_hsptlz_status = '2' OR p.pat_hsptlz_status = '5' )

/*getReqHospitalization*/ SELECT h.hsptlz_no , h.pat_code , h.treat_no , h.hsptlz_payment , to_char(to_date(h.hsptlz_in_date),'YYYY-MM-DD') hsptlz_in_date , h.hsptlz_out_date , h.sck_bd_no , h.sckrm_no , p.pat_name , p.pat_hsptlz_status , p.pat_hsptlz_in_date , p.pat_hsptlz_out_plan , p.pat_ihidnum , p.pat_addr , p.pat_dtl_addr , p.pat_tel , e.emp_nm FROM tb_hospitalization h INNER JOIN tb_patient p ON h.pat_code = p.pat_code INNER JOIN tb_clinic c ON c.treat_no = h.treat_no INNER JOIN tb_receipt r ON r.rcept_no = c.rcept_no INNER JOIN tb_clinic_schedule cs ON cs.schd_no = r.schd_no INNER JOIN tb_employee e ON e.emp_no = cs.emp_no WHERE h.hsptlz_no = #{hsptlzNo}
mapper.update: /*updatePatInHos*/ UPDATE tb_patient SET pat_hsptlz_status = '3' WHERE pat_code = #{patCode}
/*updateInHosVO*/ UPDATE tb_hospitalization SET hsptlz_in_date = TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE HSPTLZ_NO = #{hsptlzNo}
/*updatePatOutHos*/ UPDATE tb_patient SET pat_hsptlz_status = '1' WHERE pat_code = #{patCode}
/*updateOutHosVO*/ UPDATE tb_hospitalization SET hsptlz_out_date = TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD'), hsptlz_ys = 'Y' WHERE hsptlz_no = #{hsptlzNo}
mapper.select: /*getDetailNoDuringInHos*/ SELECT cd.detail_no , p.pat_name , p.pat_code , h.hsptlz_in_date , h.hsptlz_out_date , sr.sckrm_no , srt.sckrm_type_price , (TO_DATE(h.hsptlz_out_date)- TO_DATE(h.hsptlz_in_date)) * srt.sckrm_type_price AS hos_room_total_price FROM tb_chart_detail cd INNER JOIN tb_clinic c ON c.treat_no = cd.treat_no INNER JOIN tb_receipt r ON r.rcept_no = c.rcept_no INNER JOIN tb_hospitalization h ON h.pat_code = r.pat_code INNER JOIN tb_patient p ON p.pat_code = r.pat_code INNER JOIN tb_sick_room sr ON sr.sckrm_no = h.sckrm_no INNER JOIN tb_sick_room_type srt ON srt.sckrm_type_code = sr.sckrm_type_code WHERE to_char(cd.detail_reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN h.HSPTLZ_IN_DATE AND TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND h.hsptlz_no = #{hsptlzNo} AND cd.detail_no != (SELECT cd1.detail_no FROM tb_chart_detail cd1 WHERE cd1.treat_no = h.treat_no)

SELECT srt.sckrm_type_price FROM tb_hospitalization h INNER JOIN tb_sick_room sr ON sr.sckrm_no = h.sckrm_no INNER JOIN tb_sick_room_type srt ON srt.sckrm_type_code = sr.sckrm_type_code WHERE h.hsptlz_no = #{hsptlzNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_hospitalization SET hsptlz_payment = #{sckrmTypePrice} * (TO_DATE(hsptlz_out_date)-TO_DATE(hsptlz_in_date)) WHERE hsptlz_no = #{hsptlzNo}
